link.title: Saiki API Reference
link.description:
Welcome to the Saiki API documentation. Here you will find detailed information about using Saiki as a Library, and about our REST and WebSocket APIs. To use the REST or Websocket API, you must first start the Saiki server by running the following command in your terminal:

```bash
saiki --mode server
```

By default, the server will start on `http://localhost:3001`.
